plot: Teenager Stacey Stone aspires to move away from her boring hometown and become a world class journalist. For now, though, she's busy running an agony aunt column for her school newspaper.
plot_en: Teenager Stacey Stone aspires to move away from her boring hometown and become a world class journalist. For now, though, she's busy running an agony aunt column for her school newspaper.
plot_es: Teenager Stacey Stone aspires to move away from her boring hometown and become a world class journalist. For now, though, she's busy running an agony aunt column for her school newspaper.
title: Stacey Stone
